newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Bank Indonesia supplies 1.666 trln rph temporarily.
newsitem.headline: Bank Indonesia supplies 1.666 trln rph temporarily.

text.p: Indonesia's central bank, Bank Indonesia, supplied some 1.666 trillion rupiah temporarily on the money market early on Friday, money traders said.

Some 1.819 trillion rupiah of central bank certificates (SBIs) were due today, compared with some 103 billion rupiah of maturing short-term papers (SBPUs) and 50 billion rupiah of SBIs to be settled today.
